com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.config.lb
Class lbmonitor_metric_binding

java.lang.Object
  com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.base.base_resource
      com.citrix.netscaler.nitro.resource.config.lb.lbmonitor_metric_binding

public class lbmonitor_metric_binding
extends base_resource

Binding class showing the metric that can be bound to lbmonitor.
